rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示道路和飞机噪音与心房颤动风险升高有关研究结果表明，交通噪音暴露与心房颤动有关，凸显了环境因素在心血管健康中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Road-and-aircraft-noise-linked-to-elevated-atrial-fibrillation-risk-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Road-and-aircraft-noise-linked-to-elevated-atrial-fibrillation-risk-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bd72e53-892f-4309-a304-aedec4e1a774 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 05:24:00 -0400 Road and aircraft noise linked to elevated atrial fibrillation risk, study reveals
中风仍然是全球死亡的主要原因，其风险增加与生活方式因素有关《柳叶刀》神经病学研究提供了对中风负担和风险的最新估计，强调在高风险地区采取有针对性的干预措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Stroke-remains-a-leading-cause-of-death-globally-with-increased-risk-linked-to-lifestyle-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Stroke-remains-a-leading-cause-of-death-globally-with-increased-risk-linked-to-lifestyle-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=405be0a9-15ac-4ea9-8596-e2dfbde07ac2 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 04:57:00 -0400 Stroke remains a leading cause of death globally, with increased risk linked to lifestyle factors
身体活动和饮食如何影响青少年的睡眠研究人员回顾了身体活动和饮食对青少年睡眠持续时间和质量的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/How-physical-activity-and-diet-impact-sleep-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/How-physical-activity-and-diet-impact-sleep-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bbbc600-9578-4931-bc2b-f9e05a7f4bac Fri, 04 Oct 2024 04:31:00 -0400 How physical activity and diet impact sleep in adolescents
研究强调 doxy-PEP 对预防性传播感染的益处和风险在尝试该策略的地方，在高风险性接触后服用一剂口服抗生素强力霉素可以显着降低性传播感染（STI）的发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-highlights-benefits-and-risks-of-doxy-PEP-for-STI-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-highlights-benefits-and-risks-of-doxy-PEP-for-STI-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8bae230-9ad9-499a-b508-a1db5742d120 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 01:03:09 -0400 Study highlights benefits and risks of doxy-PEP for STI prevention
新研究强调幼儿的超加工食品消费根据伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究，英国幼儿近一半（47%）的卡路里来自超加工食品（UPF），到七岁时这一比例将上升至 59%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-research-highlights-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-research-highlights-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9b61fac-0f67-4fc0-aeac-86d02220c991 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:55:58 -0400 New research highlights ultra-processed food consumption in young children
英国癌症研究中心支持开发预防性卵巢癌疫苗的研究在这项研究中，英国癌症研究中心资助的科学家将确定疫苗的目标。他们将找出早期卵巢癌细胞表面的哪些蛋白质最容易被免疫系统识别，以及疫苗如何有效地杀死称为类器官的卵巢癌微型模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Cancer-Research-UK-backs-study-to-develop-preventive-ovarian-cancer-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Cancer-Research-UK-backs-study-to-develop-preventive-ovarian-cancer-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd966310-5760-4996-bd5c-fcf3d7676655 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:51:08 -0400 Cancer Research UK backs study to develop preventive ovarian cancer vaccine
研究人员拨款 280 万美元探索早产的环境原因一项新的拨款将帮助韦恩州立大学的研究人员探索细菌感染、增加其易感性的环境因素和早产风险之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Researchers-probe-environmental-causes-of-preterm-birth-with-2428M-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Researchers-probe-environmental-causes-of-preterm-birth-with-2428M-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d341a27d-7ddc-481f-88b9-5981ca7de12a Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:35:44 -0400 Researchers probe environmental causes of preterm birth with $2.8M grant
研究发现，早年创伤会增加晚年的疼痛和抑郁留级、遭受父母虐待或参与武装战斗都会产生深远的长期影响。一生的创伤甚至可能加剧临终时的疼痛和不适、抑郁和孤独。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Early-life-trauma-increases-pain-depression-in-final-years-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Early-life-trauma-increases-pain-depression-in-final-years-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f8c8018-9a82-4295-b433-62946378ac7b Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:31:47 -0400 Early-life trauma increases pain, depression in final years, study finds
美国国立卫生研究院支持非阿片类药物缓解口腔癌患者疼痛的研究德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心（UT Health San Antonio）的牙科学院在其新的疼痛治疗和成瘾研究中心下获得了美国国立卫生研究院的第一笔拨款，该中心致力于解决头颈癌患者的疼痛问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/NIH-supports-research-on-non-opioid-pain-relief-for-oral-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/NIH-supports-research-on-non-opioid-pain-relief-for-oral-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cc79942-ef9a-4043-8c4b-4b09db338041 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:26:21 -0400 NIH supports research on non-opioid pain relief for oral cancer patients
KiNet 门户网站增强了细胞信号通路中激酶功能的研究西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员推出了 KiNet，这是一个交互式门户网站，旨在探索人类细胞系统中激酶-底物的相互作用。这些相互作用在调节控制各种细胞过程（例如细胞生长、分化和对环境刺激的反应）的复杂信号传导途径中发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/KiNet-web-portal-enhances-study-of-kinase-functions-in-cellular-signaling-pathways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/KiNet-web-portal-enhances-study-of-kinase-functions-in-cellular-signaling-pathways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95231c0b-23b4-4ba8-ae4b-e41f97562071 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 00:21:37 -0400 KiNet web portal enhances study of kinase functions in cellular signaling pathways
